textAfterTable: Caterpillar DAWSON Men's Leather COMPOSITE TOE Boot Retail Price: $110.00 Various Sizes and Widths Available.  See Pull Down Menu. CAT has taken the athletic styling and comfort of a hiking boot and transformed it to be just what you need it to be the workplace.  Dawson has a composite safety toe and electrical hazard protection for safety as well as best-in-class SRX extreme slip resistant outsole. To make things better, CAT designed Dawson using our Ergonomic footwear design process; meaning careful consideration was put into the stability flexibility and comfort features so that they are enhancing the natural movements of the foot for superior comfort. Product Features: Leather/Mesh upper Nylon mesh lining Removable EVA sock liner PU mold midsole PVC outsole Strobel + cement construction EH, Slip Resistant and Composite Toe Model # P90078
